# ğŸ§  AI-Powered Exam Notes Generator

An AI-driven web application built using the **MERN Stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js)** that automatically generates structured exam notes, summaries, diagrams, and mind maps from user-provided topics.

This project leverages **Generative AI APIs** to help students create exam-ready notes instantly, reducing manual effort and improving productivity.

---

## âš™ï¸ How It Works

1. User enters a topic.
2. Frontend sends request to backend API.
3. Backend calls the AI API with optimized prompts.
4. AI returns structured content (Markdown + diagrams).
5. Backend processes and stores the response in MongoDB.
6. Frontend renders notes dynamically with diagrams and mind maps.
